title: Tiru Solutions Dashboard
description: A modern, responsive admin dashboard built for Tiru Solutions to centrally manage and monitor the Restaurant Management System across multiple client restaurants.
Provides real-time analytics with interactive charts displaying sales, revenue trends, popular menu items, peak hours, and inventory status.
Features multi-restaurant support with role-based access for super admins, restaurant owners, and managers to view and manage their specific data.
Includes tools for overseeing orders, table occupancy, staff performance, customer feedback, and system-wide notifications.
Implemented secure authentication and data isolation to ensure each restaurant's information remains private and protected.
Designed with a clean, intuitive UI using TypeScript for type safety and Recharts for dynamic data visualization.
